/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, punctuated by a few scattered clouds. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The overall color palette is dominated by shades of blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the cityscape.
